metadata.description: Tests for update_event tool (field-based) - MVP with summary/description only

test_cases.name: Update event summary only
test_cases.user_query: I need to change the title of my event at http://baikal.philflow.me/dav.php/calendars/radicale_admin/calendar-test/test-event-001.ics (etag: 'abc123') to 'New Meeting Title'
test_cases.rationale: LLM should use update_event (field-based) for simple title change instead of update_event_raw (iCal)

test_cases.name: Update event description only
test_cases.user_query: Update the description of my event at http://baikal.philflow.me/dav.php/calendars/radicale_admin/calendar-test/test-event-002.ics (etag: 'xyz789') to say 'This is the new meeting description with all the important details'

fields.description: This is the new meeting description with all the important details

test_cases.rationale: Description-only updates should use field-based approach

test_cases.name: Update both summary and description
test_cases.user_query: For the event at http://baikal.philflow.me/dav.php/calendars/radicale_admin/calendar-test/test-event-003.ics (etag: 'both456'), change the title to 'Sprint Planning' and set the description to 'Planning session for next 2-week sprint - discuss goals and assignments'

fields.description: Planning session for next 2-week sprint - discuss goals and assignments

test_cases.rationale: Multiple field updates should use update_event (PREFERRED over update_event_raw)
